item.title: Colin Crossman's CV
item.description: About Me Experience Rhea Hospitality Principal and Manager | Cary, NC & Las Vegas, NV | November 2007 - Present Raised $5.5M for acquisition and renovation of The Retreat on Charleston Peak, a hotel outside of Las Vegas. Lobbied for and negotiated a public-private partnership between Memento Mori, LLC and the Town of Cary, NC, for the construction of the Mayton Inn, a $14.5M, 45-room boutique hotel, with ~$4M in incentives and Town-backed loans.
